About Me

I am a beautiful weirdo

Biography

This is a webpage where I am supposed to talk about myself. I don't like to do that, especially if I have to sell myself to others, I'd rather just show it. Then again, a small introduction would not do me any harm, so here it goes....

The name is David and I do not know what I want to do with my life. Therefore I tried to do as much as possible: taught myself to edit and direct short films, taught myself to play multiple instruments to ultimately sound mix my own music, learned all about the film and music history. Later I studied philosophy, where logic became my love and anthropology and epistomology became my doorway into the human psyche. I got obsessed with everything that has to do with the great "Unknown"; space. I even forced myself to learn more complex math, like trigonometry and later I even learned a bit about machine learning. Since I didn't want to be the only left without a YouTube persona , I even started one of those gaming channels, and got more than ten thousand subscribers.
After all these different paths to accumulate some sort of knowledge, one thing became clear: "I am not making any money, and I need that for stuff." I needed a skill, for life.... a life-skill if you will.

"So", I asked myself, "maybe I can take all these different paths and see where they all connect." This point of connection was coding!

For the last couple of years I have been working hard to teach myself while coding different kinds of software. I mostly made games, because it's fun and asks a lot of a developer, but I also made some small apps and a twitter api bot, just to see if I could.... and I could! To summarize, I am an absurdist, wise, childish, passionate, analytical, paradoxical, "trying to be funny" human being, that loves to mix logic with creativity to make all kinds of funny, cool, beautiful and useful stuff... I am trying at least.
